channel.title: ReQ! Private servers thing for linux
channel.description:
I need fully working compiler Because if i compiler it's says: [code] server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsSDelay[firemaking[4]] = server.itemHandler.MaxDropShowDelay + 1; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ItemHandler.DroppedItemsSDelay should be accessed in a static way ---------- 22. WARNING in client.java (at line 339) server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsSDelay[firemaking[4]] = server.itemHandler.MaxDropShowDelay + 1; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ItemHandler.MaxDropShowDelay should be accessed in a static way---------- 23. WARNING in client.java (at line 367) for(int i = 0; i < server.objectHandler.MaxObjects; i++) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.MaxObjects should be accessed in a static way ---------- 24. WARNING in client.java (at line 368) if (server.objectHandler.ObjectFireID[i] == -1) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireID should be accessed in a static way ---------- 25. WARNING in client.java (at line 369) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireID[i] = 2732; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireID should be accessed in a static way ---------- 26. WARNING in client.java (at line 370) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i] = skillX; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireX should be accessed in a static way ---------- 27. WARNING in client.java (at line 371) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i] = skillY; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireY should be accessed in a static way ---------- 28. WARNING in client.java (at line 372) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireH[i] = heightLevel; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireH should be accessed in a static way ---------- 29. WARNING in client.java (at line 373) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireMaxDelay[i] = server.objectHandler.FireDelay + (server.objectHandler.FireGianDelay * firemaking[0]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireMaxDelay should be accessed in a static way ---------- 30. WARNING in client.java (at line 373) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireMaxDelay[i] = server.objectHandler.FireDelay + (server.objectHandler.FireGianDelay * firemaking[0]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.FireDelay should be accessed in a static way ---------- 31. WARNING in client.java (at line 373) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireMaxDelay[i] = server.objectHandler.FireDelay + (server.objectHandler.FireGianDelay * firemaking[0]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.FireGianDelay should be accessed in a static way ---------- 32. WARNING in client.java (at line 385) for (int i = 0; i < server.objectHandler.MaxObjects; i++) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.MaxObjects should be accessed in a static way ---------- 33. WARNING in client.java (at line 386) if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > -1) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ItemHandler.DroppedItemsID should be accessed in a static way ---------- 34. WARNING in client.java (at line 387) tmpX = server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireX should be accessed in a static way ---------- 35. WARNING in client.java (at line 388) tmpY = server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireY should be accessed in a static way ---------- 36. WARNING in client.java (at line 391) if (calcX >= -16 && calcX <= 15 && calcY >= -16 && calcY <= 15 && FireDelete[i] == false && server.objectHandler.ObjectFireH[i] == heightLevel) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireH should be accessed in a static way ---------- 37. WARNING in client.java (at line 394) ReplaceObject2(server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireID[i], 0, 10); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireX should be accessed in a static way ---------- 38. WARNING in client.java (at line 394) ReplaceObject2(server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireID[i], 0, 10); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireY should be accessed in a static way ---------- 39. WARNING in client.java (at line 394) ReplaceObject2(server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireID[i], 0, 10); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireID should be accessed in a static way ---------- 40. WARNING in client.java (at line 397) ReplaceObject2(server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i], -1, 0, 10); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireX should be accessed in a static way ---------- 41. WARNING in client.java (at line 397) ReplaceObject2(server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i], server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i], -1, 0, 10); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireY should be accessed in a static way ---------- 42. WARNING in client.java (at line 407) int fireX = server.objectHandler.ObjectFireX[i]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireX should be accessed in a static way ---------- 43. WARNING in client.java (at line 408) int fireY = server.objectHandler.ObjectFireY[i]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireY should be accessed in a static way ---------- 44. WARNING in client.java (at line 410) server.objectHandler.ObjectFireDeletecount[i]++; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireDeletecount should be accessed in a static way ---------- 45. WARNING in client.java (at line 411) if ((LastPlayerInList == playerId || LastPlayerInList == -1) && server.objectHandler.ObjectFireDeletecount[i] == TotalPlayers) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field ObjectHandler.ObjectFireDeletecount should be accessed in a static way ---------- 46. WARNING in client.java (at line 1918) String telePlayer = server.playerHandler.players[player].playerName; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 47. ERROR in client.java (at line 3362) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Syntax error, 'for each' statements are only available if source level is 5.0 ---------- 48. WARNING in client.java (at line 3362) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 49. WARNING in client.java (at line 3386) for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field NPCHandler.maxNPCs should be accessed in a static way ---------- 50. ERROR in client.java (at line 3417) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Syntax error, 'for each' statements are only available if source level is 5.0 ---------- 51. WARNING in client.java (at line 3417) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 52. ERROR in client.java (at line 3446) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Syntax error, 'for each' statements are only available if source level is 5.0 ---------- 53. WARNING in client.java (at line 3446) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 54. ERROR in client.java (at line 3474) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Syntax error, 'for each' statements are only available if source level is 5.0 ---------- 55. WARNING in client.java (at line 3474) for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 56. WARNING in client.java (at line 3702) if (server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 57. WARNING in client.java (at line 3703) hitDiff = server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[3]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 58. WARNING in client.java (at line 3705) server.playerHandler.players[index].hitDiff = hitDiff; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 59. WARNING in client.java (at line 3706) server.playerHandler.players[index].updateRequired = true; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 60. WARNING in client.java (at line 3707) server.playerHandler.players[index].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 61. WARNING in client.java (at line 3729) if (server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 62. WARNING in client.java (at line 3730) hitDiff = server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[3]; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 63. WARNING in client.java (at line 3732) server.playerHandler.players[index].hitDiff = hitDiff; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 64. WARNING in client.java (at line 3733) server.playerHandler.players[index].updateRequired = true; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 65. WARNING in client.java (at line 3734) server.playerHandler.players[index].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The static field PlayerHandler.players should be accessed in a static way ---------- 66. WARNING in client.java (at line 3941) int ReadMode = 0; ^^^^^^^^ The local variable ReadMode is never read ---------- 67. WARNING in client.java (at line 3976) int MLvl = Integer.parseInt(token3[2]); ^^^^ The local variable MLvl is never read ---------- 68. WARNING in client.java (at line 6405) int Attacklvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Attacklvl is never read ---------- 69. WARNING in client.java (at line 6406) int Strengthlvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Strengthlvl is never read ---------- 70. WARNING in client.java (at line 6407) int Defencelvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]); ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Defencelvl is never read ---------- 71. WARNING in client.java (at line 6408) int Hitpointslvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Hitpointslvl is never read ---------- 72. WARNING in client.java (at line 6409) int Prayerlvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Prayerlvl is never read ---------- 73. WARNING in client.java (at line 6410) int Magiclvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]); ^^^^^^^^ The local variable Magiclvl is never read ---------- 74. WARNING in client.java (at line 6411) int Rangelvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]); ^^^^^^^^ The local variable Rangelvl is never read ---------- 75. WARNING in client.java (at line 6412) int Runecraftlvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Runecraftlvl is never read ---------- 76. WARNING in client.java (at line 6413) int Herblorelvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]); ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Herblorelvl is never read ---------- 77. WARNING in client.java (at line 6414) int Agilitylvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]); ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Agilitylvl is never read ---------- 78. WARNING in client.java (at line 6415) int Craftinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]); ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Craftinglvl is never read ---------- 79. WARNING in client.java (at line 6416) int Fletchinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Fletchinglvl is never read ---------- 80. WARNING in client.java (at line 6417) int Slayerlvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]); ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Slayerlvl is never read ---------- 81. WARNING in client.java (at line 6418) int Mininglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]); ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Mininglvl is never read ---------- 82. WARNING in client.java (at line 6419) int Smithinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]); ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Smithinglvl is never read ---------- 83. WARNING in client.java (at line 6420) int Fishinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]); ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Fishinglvl is never read ---------- 84. WARNING in client.java (at line 6421) int Cookinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]); ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Cookinglvl is never read ---------- 85. WARNING in client.java (at line 6422) int Firemakinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Firemakinglvl is never read ---------- 86. WARNING in client.java (at line 6423) int Woodcuttinglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]); ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Woodcuttinglvl is never read ---------- 87. WARNING in client.java (at line 6424) int Farminglvl = getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]); ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Farminglvl is never read ---------- 88. WARNING in client.java (at line 6425) int Attackxp = playerXP[0]; ^^^^^^^^ The local variable Attackxp is never read ---------- 89. WARNING in client.java (at line 6426) int Strengthxp = playerXP[2]; ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Strengthxp is never read ---------- 90. WARNING in client.java (at line 6427) int Defencexp = playerXP[1]; ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Defencexp is never read ---------- 91. WARNING in client.java (at line 6428) int Hitpointsxp = playerXP[3]; ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Hitpointsxp is never read ---------- 92. WARNING in client.java (at line 6429) int Prayerxp = playerXP[5]; ^^^^^^^^ The local variable Prayerxp is never read ---------- 93. WARNING in client.java (at line 6430) int Magicxp = playerXP[6]; ^^^^^^^ The local variable Magicxp is never read ---------- 94. WARNING in client.java (at line 6431) int Rangexp = playerXP[4]; ^^^^^^^ The local variable Rangexp is never read ---------- 95. WARNING in client.java (at line 6432) int Runecraftxp = playerXP[20]; ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Runecraftxp is never read ---------- 96. WARNING in client.java (at line 6433) int Herblorexp = playerXP[15]; ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Herblorexp is never read ---------- 97. WARNING in client.java (at line 6434) int Agilityxp = playerXP[16]; ^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Agilityxp is never read ---------- 98. WARNING in client.java (at line 6435) int Craftingxp = playerXP[12]; ^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Craftingxp is never read ---------- 99. WARNING in client.java (at line 6436) int Fletchingxp = playerXP[9]; ^^^^^^^^^^^ The local variable Fletchingxp is never read ---------- 100. WARNING in client.java (at line 6437) int Slayerxp = playerXP[18]; ^^^^^^^^ The local variable Slayerxp is never read ---------- 100 problems (5 errors, 95 warnings)ndugu@emo-desktop:~/Desktop/pimpscape$
[/code][b]Please someone help me or im gonna go crazy!!!![/b]

item.title: ReQ! Private servers thing for linux
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:2, topic:47146”]just compile it on windows and transfer it to the linux computer over network

Also there is a different between “warnings” and “errors” try fixing the errors first. You have 5 of them :p[/quote]

Please read what you just said.

Read full topic
